DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate growth tolerance healthy term infant feed experimental infant formula , commercial infant formula human breast milk .
DOC.brief_title: Growth Tolerance Infants Fed Infant Formulas
DOC.criteria: Singleton full term birth gestational age 3742 week Birth weight > 2490 g ( ~5 lbs 8 oz ) Between 0 5 day age Smokefree home ( smoke house dwelling ) , mother breastfed group prohibit smoke study period Parent ( ) formulafed infant elect breastfeed confirm infant exclusively formulafed since birth confirm intention exclusively fee infant study infant formula duration study , Parent ( ) human milkfed infant elect breastfeed confirm infant exclusively human milkfed ( donor milk ) since birth confirm intention continue exclusively fee human milk vitamin/mineral supplementation duration study No administration vitamin mineral supplement ( exclude vitamin mineral supplement contain vitamin D , recommend healthcare professional ) , solid food juice infant enrollment duration study , unless instruct otherwise healthcare professional Adverse maternal , fetal infant medical history potential effect tolerance , growth , and/or development Infants use medication , home remedy , herbal preparation , probiotic rehydration fluid might affect gastrointestinal ( GI ) tolerance may enrol Treatment antibiotic Mother intend use combination breast formula feeding
